definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course/inevitable and right

sentences.english: That's easier said than done, of course.
And, of course, the research into pain continues.
sentences.chinese: 當然，對痛苦的研究仍在繼續。

sentences.english: Yes, it was about the car auxiliary power plants, am I right?
sentences.chinese: 當然，那是關於轎車輔助動力設備，是嗎？

sentences.english: That won't stop us from blathering on about it, of course.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這並不能阻止我們在這個問題上喋喋不休。

sentences.english: Of course it's the bride's sister group.
sentences.chinese: 當然是新娘子的姐妹團嘍。

sentences.english: Of course, we don’t accept the unrealistic overstatement about reverse merger.
sentences.chinese: 當然我們並不認同那些片面誇大反向收購作用的作法。

sentences.english: Bellringing is what I'm good at though.
I want to go back to the Flock, of course.
sentences.chinese: 我當然要回到鷗羣裏去。

sentences.english: Sure I jumped in his arms when he got here.
sentences.chinese: 當然，他進門的時候我撲進了他懷裏。

sentences.english: Manny: Of course it's still work in progress. Few rough edges, here and there.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，這工程還沒完工還有些邊邊角角要處理。

sentences.english: Naturally, the process of coming up with this list wasn't always easy.
sentences.chinese: 當然，拿出這份書名目錄的過程中並非總是很容易的。

sentences.english: Of course, lots of cookies means some of them must be put away for later days.
sentences.chinese: 當然，大量的曲奇就意味着有一些會被留着以後再喫。

sentences.english: But within reason, flirting is part and parcel of our daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 但當然了，調情是我們日常生活中不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: This, of course, is the bare minimum and restricts only administrative access.
sentences.chinese: 這當然是最小設置，僅僅限制管理訪問權限。

sentences.english: Of course, this is all just a fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這一切都還是空想。

sentences.english: He was right, of course, to avoid the mayoralty trap.
sentences.chinese: 當然，他躲開了市長這個圈套倒是正確的。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
